# {-}
**Ámbito `r amb_title`**

## **Descripción** {-}
`r descripcion`
Cada fila es/son `r as.character(detalle$dato)`. 
```{r detalle, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width='50%', fig.asp=.75, fig.align='center'}
library(gt)
masinfo<-detalle[,c(9,12:20)]
masinfo |>
  gt() |>
  tab_header(
    title = glue::glue("{titulo_capa}"),
    subtitle = glue::glue("Ámbito {amb_title}, Grupo {detalle$grupo}")
  ) |>
  cols_width(everything() ~ px(100)) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_fill(color = "lightblue"),
    locations = cells_body(columns = calidad)) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(size = px(12)),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = everything()))
```
Link: `r as.character(detalle$link)`

## **Informe** {-}

Este es un informe sobre *`r titulo_capa`* que incluye un *analisis de completitud de fichas, numero do observaciones unicos, y un extento*.

```{r leer-shp, include=FALSE}
require(sf)
capa<-sf::st_read(path, layer=str_glue("{titulo_capa}"))
obs<- dim(capa)
masinfo<-detalle[,c(4:9,12:22)]
```

Hay **`r obs[1]` observaciones** y **`r obs[2]` variables** .

\par

## Diagnosis: {-}

```{r diagnosing, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width='70%', fig.asp=.50, fig.align='center'}
library(dplyr)
require(knitr)
library(flextable)
library(magrittr)
library(gt)

capa_diagnosis<-diagnosticar(capa)

names(capa_diagnosis)[1]<-"nombre_columna"
capa_diagnosis<-tibble(capa_diagnosis)

capa_diagnosis |>
  gt() |>
  cols_width(everything() ~ px(80)) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_fill(color = "gray95"),
    locations = cells_body(columns = nombre_columna)) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_fill(color = "gray95"),
    locations = cells_body(columns = nombre_columna)) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(size = px(12)),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = everything())) |>
  data_color(
    columns = pc_completo,
    direction = "column",
    method = "numeric",
    palette = "ggsci::red_material", 
    domain= c(0,99), 
    na_color = "white") |> 
  data_color(
    columns = pc_repetido,
    direction = "column",
    method = "numeric",
    palette = c("lightyellow", "lightblue")) |> 
  opt_interactive(use_text_wrapping = FALSE, use_resizers = TRUE, use_highlight = TRUE,
                  use_compact_mode = TRUE, page_size_default = 20)

```
```{r plotting1, echo = FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(tmap)
library(ggmap)

ex <- st_bbox(capa)
ex<-st_as_sfc(ex)%>%
  st_as_sf()
exx<-sf::st_transform(ex, 4326)
st_crs(exx) <- 4326
exy <- st_bbox(exx)
left<- as.double(exy[1])
bottom<- as.double(exy[2])
right<-as.double(exy[3])
top<-as.double(exy[4])
```


```{r plotting2, echo = FALSE}
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)
library(webshot) 
library(htmlwidgets)
geometry_type<-st_geometry_type(capa[1,])
is_polygon <- (geometry_type == "POLYGON" | geometry_type == "MULTIPOLYGON" )
is_point <- (geometry_type == "POINT" | geometry_type == "MULTIPOINT" )
is_line <- (geometry_type == "LINESTRING" | geometry_type == "MULTILINESTRING" )
type<- c(is_polygon, is_point, is_line)
repro<-sf::st_transform(capa, 4326)
st_crs(repro) <- 4326

m <-leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  addRectangles(
    lng1=left, lat1=top,
    lng2=right, lat2=bottom,
    color="#03F",
    fillColor = "transparent", 
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color = "white", weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE)
  ) 

if(type[1]==TRUE){
  m <- m %>% addPolygons(
  data = repro,  
  fillColor = "blue",  
  color = "black",  
  weight = 1,  
  opacity = 1.0, 
  fillOpacity = 0.5, 
  highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color = "white", weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE))
} else if (type[2] == TRUE) {
  m <- m %>% addCircles(
  data = repro,  
  radius = 10,
  fillColor = "blue", 
  color = "black", 
  weight = 1, 
  opacity = 0.5)
} else if (type[3] == TRUE) {
  m <- m %>% addPolylines(
  data = repro,
  fillColor = "blue", 
  color = "black", 
  weight = 1, 
  opacity = 1, 
  highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color = "white", weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE))
}

```
